name: Continuous Learning
detail: Ability to swiftly adapt to new tools and technologies, adjust to shifting requirements, and effectively implement them in projects.

name: Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
detail: Proficiency in automating and managing infrastructure using code, bypassing manual procedures. Acquainted with tools such as Terraform, Ansible, and CloudFormation.

name: Scalability
detail: Skilled in efficiently managing the rising demands of a system, application, or process without jeopardizing performance or functionality.

name: Microservices Architecture
detail: Adept at designing modular, independent services that function as discrete entities within a broader system, ensuring improved scalability, maintenance, and fault isolation.

name: Cloud Computing & Deployment
detail: Familiar with cloud platforms such as AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud, and the processes of deploying applications on them.

name: Java Spring Boot
detail: Expertise in developing robust and scalable backend applications using Java Spring Boot framework.
